short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin has several useful tools for Agents when working with FreshService Tickets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds ability to add a note, reply, forward, add time and start the timer while viewing a FreshService ticket. Also includes links to your portal specific url for creating new tickets, service requests and going to your FreshService Dashboard!
